name: Password Protection
description: Protect pages and content on your site with passwords. See 'More Info' for details. View Readme for more details on theme compatability.

logins.label: Pages & Passwords
logins.info: URL and password separated by '|'. Each URL|Password should be separated by ','. The URL should not include the domain, and should only be the directory or album name.

email.label: Contact Email
email.info: Email address to show on login form for access, will not show if blank.
